Sentencas: The aim of this work is to develop a new rigorous model to study the structure performance relationship of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes.
Titulo: A novel approach to study the structure versus performance relationship of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: A new two-dimensional, geometrical model which captures the inhomogeneous nature of the location of electrochemical reactions based on random packing of electronic and ionic conducting particles has been developed.
Titulo: A novel approach to study the structure versus performance relationship of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: The results show that the concentration of oxygen inside the cathode in the 2D model is not only a function of the electrode depth but also changes along the width of the electrode.
Titulo: A novel approach to study the structure versus performance relationship of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: Furthermore the effect of composition of the electrode on the length of active three-phase boundary (TBP) and total polarization resistance has been demonstrated.
Titulo: A novel approach to study the structure versus performance relationship of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: A parametric study of the effect of the conductivity of ionic conductor and diffusion coefficient on the performance of the electrode has been given.
Titulo: A novel approach to study the structure versus performance relationship of SOFC electrodes
